seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 4+ years of experience with at least 2 years in data operations/infrastructure

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, storage, and infrastructure

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both ETL/ELT (batch) and data streaming platforms (Kafka, Kinesis) as nice-to-have, along with familiarity with various data/table formats

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions 'Leadership' as a must-have soft skill, contributing to team formation, and supporting data discovery/catalog, but no direct reports indicated

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS mentioned explicitly in qualifications ('Strong knowledge of AWS or other public cloud platforms') and AWS Athena mentioned as a data warehousing technology

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other clouds explicitly mentioned beyond AWS

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL/ELT (batch) is a must-have, and data streaming platforms (Kafka, Kinesis) are mentioned as nice-to-have

orchestrator_category.evidence: Dagster, Airflow, and Prefect mentioned explicitly as must-have data orchestration tools, with Airflow-like tools being the broader category but Dagster/Prefect are modern alternatives

storage_layer.evidence: Datalake technologies (must-have) and AWS Athena (warehouse-like) mentioned, along with familiarity with Iceberg (lakehouse) as a table format

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid work model with core days in Boston, MA office, and location stated as Boston, MA

timezone_focus.evidence: Location is Boston, MA, but no explicit timezone requirements mentioned beyond hybrid work model

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid work model allows flexibility but does not mention relocation requirements; location is stated as Boston, MA without further restrictions

h1b_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of H1B sponsorship; 'ext_visa_sponsorship_stated' is 'not_mentioned' in Pass 1

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: 'ext_work_auth_text' states openness to all individuals but does not explicitly mention OPT/CPT; no welcoming tone toward students or visa types

citizenship_required.evidence: 'ext_work_auth_text' explicitly states embracing applications from all individuals regardless of identity, implying no citizenship restrictions

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment type stated and benefits mentioned, indicating W2 employee status

benefits_level.evidence: Equity mentioned, along with a 'comprehensive total rewards package' and Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) as premium benefits

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'learning and growth are continuous' and 'investing in developing others' in company values, indicating growth opportunities but no explicit career tracks

mentorship_signals.evidence: Company values include 'Lift As We Climb' and mentions 'mentor and develop' in ERGs, suggesting mentorship opportunities but no formal program stated

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion paths or advancement in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility, lateral moves, or team changes in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role is Senior Data Engineer with leadership expectations as IC; no explicit management or specialist tracks mentioned but inferred from 'no direct reports' and technical focus

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have and nice-to-have skills, with a balanced ratio of required vs preferred qualifications

scope_definition.evidence: Job description and responsibilities are focused on data engineering tasks and systems, with no ambiguity in role scope

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Must-have skills and years of experience (4+ years) align well with the inferred seniority level (senior)
